metadata.title: CVE-2017-12474 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The AP4_AtomSampleTable::GetSample function in Core/Ap4AtomSampleTable.cppin Bento4 mp42ts before 1.5.0-616 allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a craftedmp4 file.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
